### Load the data
```{r}
fifa = read_csv("./Data/CompleteDataset.csv")
data = fifa %>% 
    janitor::clean_names() %>% 
    select(-c(x1, name, photo, flag, club_logo, wage)) %>% 
    mutate(value = readr::parse_number(value))
```
